comments:
With Eclipse RC1.

Using Update Manager (Help > Software Updates > Find and Install)
to download CDT 200406100301 (by default the SDK) from 
 http://update.eclipse.org/tools/cdt/updates/builds/2.0
Update Manager downloads uneventfully.

Upon restart, an error dialog appears:
Problems opening perspective 'org.eclipse.cdt.ui.CPerspective'

(Downloading the zips manually works successfully.)

- Brent
